马来西亚.text: [16-01-26 · 马来西亚] Secretary-General of ASEAN participates in the 5th ADGMIN + U.S. Meeting
马来西亚.text_zh: [16-01-26 · 马来西亚] 东盟秘书长参加第五届ADGMIN + 美国会议
马来西亚.summary: Secretary-General of ASEAN, Dr. Kao Kim Hourn, today participated in the 5th ADGMIN + U.S. Meeting held in Hanoi, Viet Nam. The Meeting welcomed the U.S.’ strong commitment to assisting ASEAN’s Dig
马来西亚.summary_zh: 东盟秘书长高金辉博士今天参加了在越南河内举行的第五届ADGMIN + 美国会议。会议欢迎美国对协助东盟数字化的强烈承诺。

马来西亚.text: [16-01-26 · 马来西亚] Secretary-General of ASEAN participates in the 6th ADGMIN + China Meeting
马来西亚.text_zh: [16-01-26 · 马来西亚] 东盟秘书长参加第六届ADGMIN + 中国会议
马来西亚.summary: Secretary-General of ASEAN, Dr. Kao Kim Hourn, today participated in the 6th ADGMIN + China Meeting held in Hanoi, Viet Nam. SG Dr. Kao welcomed the initiative to develop an ASEAN-China Action Plan
马来西亚.summary_zh: 东盟秘书长高金辉博士今天参加了在越南河内举行的第六届ADGMIN + 中国会议。高秘书长欢迎制定东盟-中国行动计划的倡议。

马来西亚.text: [16-01-26 · 马来西亚] Secretary-General of ASEAN participates in the 5th ADGMIN + ROK Meeting
马来西亚.text_zh: [16-01-26 · 马来西亚] 东盟秘书长参加第五届ADGMIN + 韩国会议
马来西亚.summary: Secretary-General of ASEAN, Dr. Kao Kim Hourn, today participated in the 5th ADGMIN + ROK Meeting held in Hanoi, Viet Nam. SG Dr. Kao welcomed the endorsement of the ASEAN-ROK 2026 Digital Work Pla
马来西亚.summary_zh: 东盟秘书长高金辉博士今天参加了在越南河内举行的第五届ADGMIN + 韩国会议。高秘书长欢迎对东盟-韩国2026数字工作计划的认可。

马来西亚.text: [16-01-26 · 马来西亚] Secretary-General of ASEAN participates in the 5th ADGMIN + Japan Meeting
马来西亚.text_zh: [16-01-26 · 马来西亚] 东盟秘书长参加第五届ADGMIN + 日本会议
马来西亚.summary: Secretary-General of ASEAN, Dr. Kao Kim Hourn, today attended the 5th  ADGMIN + Japan Meeting held in Hanoi, Viet Nam. SG Dr. Kao proposed ASEAN and Japan to focus on collaboration on the deploymen
马来西亚.summary_zh: 东盟秘书长高金辉博士今天出席了在越南河内举行的第五届ADGMIN + 日本会议。高秘书长提议东盟和日本专注于在部署方面的合作。

马来西亚.text: [16-01-26 · 马来西亚] Secretary-General of ASEAN delivers remarks at the Opening Ceremony of the 6th ASEAN Digital Ministers’ Meeting and Related Meetings
马来西亚.text_zh: [16-01-26 · 马来西亚] 东盟秘书长在第六届东盟数字部长会议及相关会议开幕式上发表讲话
马来西亚.summary: Secretary-General of ASEAN, Dr. Kao Kim Hourn, today delivered remarks at the Opening Ceremony of the 6th ASEAN Digital Ministers’ Meeting (ADGMIN) and Related Meeting, held in Hanoi, Viet Nam. Dur
马来西亚.summary_zh: 东盟秘书长高金辉博士今天在越南河内举行的第六届东盟数字部长会议（ADGMIN）及相关会议的开幕式上发表了讲话。期间

industry_observations.text: [16-01-26 · 其他] JP Morgan Asset Management targets Singapore and Asia stocks with new fund under MAS initiative
industry_observations.text_zh: [16-01-26 · 其他] 摩根大通资产管理公司在新加坡金融管理局倡议下推出新基金，瞄准新加坡和亚洲股票
industry_observations.summary: It will allocate 15 per cent to 25 per cent of the new fund to local small- and mid-cap stocks.
industry_observations.summary_zh: 新基金将分配15%至25%用于本地小型和中型股票。

industry_observations.text: [16-01-26 · 科技] Co-living operator The Assembly Place seeks to raise $18.3m through SGX listing
industry_observations.text_zh: [16-01-26 · 科技] 共享居住运营商The Assembly Place寻求通过新加坡交易所上市筹集1830万美元
industry_observations.summary: Proceeds of $9.7 million will be used to expand its co-living business and fund other investments.
industry_observations.summary_zh: 970万美元的收益将用于扩展其共同居住业务并资助其他投资。

industry_observations.text: [16-01-26 · 其他] LTA awards S$326 million contract for tunnels in Downtown Line extension
industry_observations.text_zh: [16-01-26 · 其他] 新加坡陆路交通管理局授予3.26亿新元合同用于市区线延伸段的隧道建设
industry_observations.summary: Construction works to connect the Downtown Line to the North-South Line are expected to begin by the second quarter of 2026, with passenger service targeted to commence in 2035.
industry_observations.summary_zh: 连接市区线与南北线的建设工程预计将在2026年第二季度开始，乘客服务目标在2035年开始运营。

industry_observations.text: [16-01-26 · 科技] CapitaLand Integrated Commercial Trust to sell Bukit Panjang Plaza for $428 million
industry_observations.text_zh: [16-01-26 · 科技] 凯德综合商业信托将以4.28亿新元出售武吉班让广场
industry_observations.summary: Sale is aimed at optimising the REIT’s portfolio and giving it greater financial flexibility.
industry_observations.summary_zh: 此次出售旨在优化房地产投资信托基金的投资组合，并为其提供更大的财务灵活性。

industry_observations.text: [16-01-26 · 科技] Opportunities in S’pore, Asia as venture capital players focus on AI, fintech and healthtech in 2026
industry_observations.text_zh: [16-01-26 · 科技] 随着风险投资者在2026年聚焦人工智能、金融科技和健康科技，新加坡和亚洲的机会
industry_observations.summary: This is even as fundraising will remain difficult globally.
industry_observations.summary_zh: 尽管如此，全球筹款仍将面临困难。

industry_observations.text: [16-01-26 · 科技] HSBC said to be weighing sale of Singapore insurance business
industry_observations.text_zh: [16-01-26 · 科技] 汇丰银行被报道正在考虑出售其新加坡保险业务
industry_observations.summary: A sale would follow other HSBC disposals in Europe and North America.
industry_observations.summary_zh: 此次出售将跟随汇丰在欧洲和北美的其他资产处置。

industry_observations.text: [16-01-26 · 其他] MPA offers more LNG bunkering licences to address growing demand for cleaner marine fuels
industry_observations.text_zh: [16-01-26 · 其他] 新加坡海事与港务局提供更多液化天然气加注许可证，以应对对更清洁海洋燃料日益增长的需求
industry_observations.summary: Experts say demand for LNG as marine fuel will grow as more LNG-powered vessels are built.
industry_observations.summary_zh: 专家表示，随着更多液化天然气动力船舶的建造，对液化天然气作为船用燃料的需求将会增长。
